title: Health (Pharmacy): Medicine (Usefulness 8)
description: Traveler usefulness 8/10 phrases for the Medicine subcategory within Health (Pharmacy). Includes 3 card(s).

cards.english: Please give me pills to calm my digestive system.

cards.romaji: Kono seichozai wa ikiura desu ka.
cards.japanese: この整腸剤はいくらですか。
